I have forgiven Michael Vick . From this day forward, I will no longer bash Michael Vick on my Facebook page or in this column. There will be no more references to`` scum'' or a piece of trash who shouldn't be given the privilege of playing quarterback in the NFL. Seriously, I am trying to learn the true meaning of the word`` forgiveness'' and sometimes that means letting things go. This does not mean I condone his felonious acts of animal cruelty

Stop Big Media coalition, to bluntly declare,`` Comcast's sudden commitment to nonprofit news seems suspect.'' Sen. Bernie Sanders is right when he suggests that the FCC will have a hard time keeping Comcast in line. Once we allow companies to become this powerful, the FCC does not regulate them. They regulate the FCC, says the senator. The FCC will have a hard time saying no to competing companies that demand permission to create equally powerful combines. X Factor'' involved the revelation that the pitch-correcting software Auto-Tune was used on at least one contestant's taped audition. Simon Cowell said Monday it was the work of sound technicians and done without his knowledge. Once we found out what was going on it was stopped immediately.... '' Looking for a spark, 76ers coach Eddie Jordan benched power forward Elton Brand and paired rookie Jrue Holiday in the backcourt with Allen Iverson . Jordan's move worked: Jrue Holiday had 15 points, seven rebounds and six assists. He just put us in a good rhythm tonight and had us flowing, Allen Iverson said. Elton Brand , who was previously benched in some fourth quarters, said it was hard to complain about his role after a victory.
